item.title: These racist graffiti were reported and have been assigned “ State changed to: Fixed” but they are still obviously present, 21st July
item.description:
These graffiti were reported on Saturday with others on the parapet of the bridge. I received notification that “ State changed to: Fixed” but I was shocked to find the ones on the pavement were untouched. No-one could miss them so given the nature of the racist significance I would question the judgement or commitment of the operative who cleaned one graffito but left the worst ones. Please send them back to do the job properly.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Downs Hill, Shortlands, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Garage full of fly tipping, 21st July
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Lemmon Road, East Greenwich, London

item.title: 30 Farleigh Road - construction rubbish left on pavement, 21st July
item.description:

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Farleigh Road, Hackney, London
